title: From Our Home Correspondent 22/10/17
content: Mishal Husain presents more reflections on life in Britain today, including diesel car dilemmas, a mother remembers her army son and picking up the pieces after devastating floods
contentSnippet: Mishal Husain presents more reflections on life in Britain today, including diesel car dilemmas, a mother remembers her army son and picking up the pieces after devastating floods

itunes.author: BBC Radio 4
itunes.subtitle: What to do with a diesel car, bureaucracy frustrates remembrance and cleaning up a flood
itunes.summary: Mishal Husain presents more reflections on life in Britain today, including diesel car dilemmas, a mother remembers her army son and picking up the pieces after devastating floods
